title: r/Maliciouscompliance "I Want It EXTRA SPICY!"
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, OP is working at a restaurant when a customer comes in and orders a dish extra spicy. OP asks, "Are you sure?" The customer doubles down and demands that they make it even spicier than their spiciest dish! Sure thing boss! Extra super set your tongue on fire spicy, coming right up! If you like this video, subscribe to my channel for more daily Reddit content!
